Notes: History was erased by the Awakening of the Original Creator.
Creation of the Forsaken Land of Gods after "Their" battle.
Pathways lost in the madness which stain the lands and seas with blood.
Other ancient gods emerged from the ashes.
Eight ancient Gods ruled the lands for a short period of time before they turned on each other
Two Gods remained; the Giants and the Dragons
Temporary peace was upheld during this time.
The entity before the ancient gods emerged and took "their" power which led to humanity as the dominant race.
Ancient Sun God was taken down by the newer Gods and they declared themselves as the orthodox gods
The fall of the Ancient Sun God cause others crave for more power and various conflicts for power
With the division between the Gods Solomon established "his" Empire
The six gods supported the Tudor and Trunsoest Empire to bring down the Solomon Empire
The unexpected revival of Solomon split the two empires into three and shook the continet once again
Due to a sinister plot by one of the emperors it brought all the emperors including from the southern continet to a warring period
Orthodox Gods unable to believe one and another allied with their most trustworthy and fought each other
The seven gods heavily injured and the astral barrier of the world fractured which caused them to move to their "Divine Kingdoms" to mend the cracks.
